pages.text: Through rites witches are able to summon a host of different creatures, some natural and some maybe not so natural.

$(l)Demon Summoning Rite$()$(br2)$(o)Summon a demon to the overworld [WIP]:Currently only grants a demon heart$()$(br2) - Refined Evil$(br) - Blaze Rod$(br) - Ender Pearl$(br2)Altar power: 3000$(br)Charged attuned stone allowed$(br2)Large infernal circle
